alert.note: Alert for Northern Coos; Northern Grafton; Southern Coos; Southern Grafton (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 2:45PM EST until January 20 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...SNOW CONTINUES TO IMPACT THE AREA INTO THIS EVENING BEFORE ENDING EARLY TONIGHT... .Light snow will continue on and off through the evening, with additional light accumulations expected. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. * WHERE...Portions of south central, west central, and western Maine. Portions of northern New Hampshire. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Occasional light snow will continue into this evening with additional impacts to travel due to snowfall accumulations on untreated roads.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org

area.areaDesc: Northern Coos; Northern Grafton; Southern Coos; Southern Grafton
